The [92msystem[0m [93mdemonstrates[0m a [93mhigh[0m [93mscreening[0m [93mthroughput[0m, [93mcapable[0m of [93mpreparing[0m up to [93m20[0m [93mdistinct[0m [93msamples[0m in a [93msingle[0m, [93mautomated[0m [93mrun[0m, with [93meach[0m [93msynthesis[0m [93mrequiring[0m only [93m30[0m [93mminutes[0m. A [93mkey[0m [93mthroughput[0m [93moptimising[0m [93mfeature[0m is the [93mparallel[0m [93mprocess[0m [93mexecution[0m, [93mwhereby[0m [93mprecursor[0m [93mpreparation[0m and [92msystem[0m [93mcleaning[0m are [93mperformed[0m [93mconcurrently[0m [93mvia[0m the [93mreactor[0m [93mheating[0m, [93msynthesis[0m, and [93mcooling[0m [93mcycles[0m. [93mAll[0m [93mwashing[0m [93mprocedures[0m, for [93mboth[0m the [93mprecursor[0m [93mpreparation[0m [93mmodule[0m and [93mreactor[0m [93munit[0m, are [93mfully[0m [93mautomated[0m, [93mfurther[0m [93mminimising[0m [93mdowntime[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mdemonstrated[0m its [93mversatility[0m by [93msuccessfully[0m [93msynthesising[0m a [93mwide[0m [93mrange[0m of [93mMEA[0m [93mNPs[0m, [93mincluding[0m [93mhigh[0m-[93mentropy[0m [93malloys[0m, [93mcomposed[0m of [93mvarious[0m [93mcombinations[0m of [93md[0m- and [93mp[0m-[93mblock[0m [93mmetals[0m. The [93msynthesized[0m [93mmaterials[0m, [93mranging[0m from [93mbimetallic[0m [93mRuPd[0m to [93mten[0m-[93melement[0m [93mCoNiCuRuRhPdInSnIrPt[0m [93malloys[0m, were [93mall[0m [93mcrystalline[0m, [93msingle[0m-[93mphase[0m [93mface[0m-[93mcentred[0m [93mcubic[0m [93msolid[0m [93msolutions[0m. [93mFurthermore[0m, the [92mplatform[0m [93menables[0m the [93mdirect[0m [93mone[0m-[93mstep[0m [93msynthesis[0m of [93msupported[0m [93mMEA[0m [93mcatalysts[0m, [93msuch[0m as [93mRuRhPdIrPt[0m/[33mCeO[0m [93m2[0m . For this [93msupported[0m [93mcatalyst[0m, [93mwe[0m [93machieved[0m a [93mpractical[0m [93mmass[0m [93mthroughput[0m with a [93mtheoretical[0m [93mproduction[0m [93mrate[0m of [93m0[0m.[93m5[0m [93mg[0m [93mh[0m -[93m1[0m for the [93mMEA[0m [93mNPs[0m ([93mcorresponding[0m to [93m27[0m [93mg[0m [93mh[0m -[93m1[0m for the [93mtotal[0m [93mcatalyst[0m [93mincluding[0m the [93msupport[0m). The [93mfinal[0m [93mproduct[0m [93myield[0m was [93mapproximately[0m [93m56[0m% under the [93mcurrent[0m [93mprotocol[0m, which is [93mdesigned[0m to [93mprevent[0m [93mcross[0m-[93mcontamination[0m by [93mautomatically[0m [93mdiscarding[0m the [93minitial[0m and [93mfinal[0m [93mportions[0m of the [93mproduct[0m [93mslurry[0m. [93mWe[0m [93manticipate[0m this [93myield[0m [93mcan[0m be [93mreadily[0m [93mimproved[0m in a [92msystem[0m [93mconfiguration[0m [93moptimized[0m for [93mmass[0m [93mthroughput[0m [93mrather[0m than for [93mhigh[0m-[93mthroughput[0m [93mscreening[0m. This [93mstudy[0m [93mpresents[0m a [93mscalable[0m and [93mversatile[0m [92msystem[0m for [93mhigh[0m-[93mthroughput[0m [93mMEA[0m [93mNPs[0m [93msynthesis[0m and [93moffers[0m a [93mpractical[0m [93msolution[0m for [93mbridging[0m the [93mgap[0m between [93mcomputational[0m [93mpredictions[0m and [93mexperimental[0m [93mmaterials[0m [93mdevelopment[0m.
- [93mThermostable[0m [93mblock[0m [93mcopolymers[0m, [93m1[0m. [93mThermotropic[0m [93mpoly[0m([93mester[0m‐[93mimide[0m) [93mblock[0m [93mcopolymers[0m: [93mAbstract[0m [93mNew[0m [93mpoly[0m([93mester[0m‐[93mimide[0m) [93mblock[0m [93mcopolymers[0m were [93mprepared[0m by [93mpolycondensation[0m of [93maminoterminated[0m [93mpoly[0m([93mester[0m‐[93mimide[0m) [93mblocks[0m with [93mmolecular[0m [93mweights[0m from [93m700[0m to [93m6[0m [93m000[0m with [93mterephthaloyl[0m [93mdichloride[0m, [93misophthaloyl[0m [93mdichloride[0m, [93m2[0m,[93m6[0m‐[93mnaphthalenedicarbonyl[0m [93mdichloride[0m, [93madipoly[0m [93mdichloride[0m, [93mdichlorodimethylsilane[0m or [93mdichlorotetramethylsiloxane[0m as [93mlow[0m‐[93mmolecular[0m‐[93mweight[0m [93mdifunctional[0m [93mcoupling[0m [93mreagents[0m. The [93mpoly[0m([93mester[0m‐[93mimide[0m) [93mblocks[0m were [93msynthesized[0m from [93mreadily[0m [93maccessible[0m [93mmonomers[0m. [93mDependent[0m on [93mblock[0m [93mcomposition[0m, [93mmolecular[0m [93mweight[0m of the [93mblock[0m ([93mblock[0m [93mlength[0m) and [93mkind[0m of [93mspacer[0m [93mliquid[0m‐[93mcrystalline[0m [93mpolymers[0m were [93mobtained[0m with [93mhigh[0m [93mthermal[0m [93mstability[0m and [93msolubility[0m in [93mpolar[0m [93msolvents[0m, [93myielding[0m [93mtough[0m [93mfilms[0m with [93mgood[0m [93mmechanical[0m [93mproperties[0m. The [93mformation[0m of [93mthermotropic[0m [93mmesophases[0m [93mrequired[0m the [93mproper[0m [93mbalance[0m between the [93mrigid[0m [93mblocks[0m and the [93mflexible[0m, [93mkinked[0m or “[93mcrankshaft[0m” [93mspacers[0m.
- [93mP[0m-[93mblock[0m [93mmetal[0m-[93minduced[0m [93mcharge[0m [93mredistribution[0m and [93mlattice[0m [93mstrain[0m [93massisting[0m [93mCC[0m [93mbond[0m [93mcleavage[0m and [93manti[0m‑[93mcarbon[0m [93mmonoxide[0m [93mpoisoning[0m in [93methanol[0m [93melectrooxidation[0m.: The [93mability[0m to [93mcleave[0m the [93mCC[0m [93mbond[0m [93mplays[0m a [93mcritical[0m [93mrole[0m in [93mdetermining[0m the [93mselectivity[0m of the [93methanol[0m [93melectrooxidation[0m [93mreaction[0m [93mtoward[0m [93meither[0m the [93mC1[0m or [93mC2[0m [91mpathway[0m. In this [93mwork[0m, [93mwe[0m [93msuccessfully[0m [93msynthesized[0m a [93mseries[0m of [93mdumbbell[0m-[93mshaped[0m [93mternary[0m [93mPdBiTe[0m [93malloy[0m [93mnanocrystals[0m [93mvia[0m a [93mvisible[0m [93mlight[0m-[93massisted[0m [93mmethod[0m and [93mtuned[0m the [93mlattice[0m [93mstrain[0m by [93mvarying[0m the [93mPd[0m [93mcontent[0m. Among the [93msamples[0m, [93mPdBiTe[0m-[93m3[0m-with an [93moptimal[0m [93mtensile[0m [93mstrain[0m of [93mapproximately[0m [93m3[0m.[93m6[0m %-[93mexhibited[0m the [93mhighest[0m [93mintrinsic[0m [93mactivity[0m ([93m11[0m.[93m77[0m [93mmA[0m [93mcm[0m -[93m2[0m ) and [93mmass[0m [93mactivity[0m ([93m11[0m.[93m48[0m A [93mmg[0m [93mPd[0m -[93m1[0m ) in [93methanol[0m [93moxidation[0m [93mreaction[0m ([93mEOR[0m), which are [93m4[0m.[93m04[0m and [93m7[0m.[93m41[0m [93mtimes[0m [93mhigher[0m, [93mrespectively[0m, than those of [93mcommercial[0m [93mPd[0m/[93mC[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mfound[0m that a [93mseries[0m of [93mternary[0m [93mPdBiTe[0m [93malloy[0m [93mcatalysts[0m [93mcould[0m [93madhere[0m [93mwell[0m to the [93mSabatier[0m [93mprinciple[0m, the [93moptimized[0m [93mPdBiTe[0m-[93m3[0m [93mexhibited[0m a [93mmore[0m [93msuitable[0m [93md[0m-[93mband[0m [93mcenter[0m which [93mbalanced[0m the [93mbinding[0m [93mstrength[0m with [93mreaction[0m [93mintermediates[0m, [93mthereby[0m [93mdemonstrating[0m [93menhanced[0m [93mresistance[0m to [93mCO[0m and [93maccelerating[0m the [93mEOR[0m [93mprocess[0m. In-[93msitu[0m [93mFourier[0m [93mtransform[0m [93minfrared[0m [93mspectroscopy[0m and [93mproton[0m [93mnuclear[0m [93mmagnetic[0m [93mresonance[0m [93mmeasurements[0m [93mconfirmed[0m that [93mPdBiTe[0m-[93m3[0m [93mfacilitates[0m [93mmore[0m [93mefficient[0m [93mCC[0m [93mbond[0m [93mcleavage[0m, [93mthereby[0m [93menhancing[0m [93mselectivity[0m [93mtoward[0m the [93mC1[0m [91mpathway[0m. [93mDensity[0m [93mfunctional[0m [93mtheory[0m [93mcalculations[0m [93mfurther[0m [93mrevealed[0m that the [93mincorporation[0m of [93mp[0m-[93mblock[0m [93mmetals[0m ([93mBi[0m and [93mTe[0m) [93minduces[0m [93mcharge[0m [93mredistribution[0m on the [93mPd[0m [93matoms[0m of the [93mPdBiTe[0m-[93m3[0m [93msurface[0m and [93msignificantly[0m [93mreduces[0m the [93menergy[0m [93mbarrier[0m for [93mCO[0m [93moxidation[0m. This [93menables[0m a [93mmore[0m [93mcontinuous[0m and [93mefficient[0m [93mEOR[0m [93mprocess[0m on the [93mPdBiTe[0m-[93m3[0m [93msurface[0m [93mcatalyst[0m.
- [93mSolid[0m [93mstate[0m [93mNMR[0m [93mstudies[0m of [93md[0m-[93mblock[0m and [93mp[0m-[93mblock[0m [93mmetal[0m [93mnuclei[0m: [93mApplications[0m to [93morganometallic[0m and [93mcoordination[0m [93mchemistry[0m
- [93mPressure[0m-[93minduced[0m [93mredox[0m [93mreversal[0m of [93miron[0m and the [93mdistribution[0m of [93melements[0m in [93mdeep[0m [93mEarth[0m.: [93mWe[0m [93mdemonstrate[0m a [93mremarkable[0m [91mchange[0m in the [93mchemical[0m [93mbonding[0m of [93miron[0m under [93mpressure[0m that [93munderlies[0m the [93mdistribution[0m of [93melements[0m in the [93mEarth[0m'[93ms[0m [93mmantle[0m and [93mcore[0m. [93mUsing[0m a [93mmassive[0m-[93mscale[0m, [93mfirst[0m-[93mprinciples[0m [93mstudy[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mshow[0m that while [93mreacting[0m with [93mp[0m -[93mblock[0m [93melements[0m under [93mincreasing[0m [93mpressure[0m from [93mambient[0m to [93mEarth[0m [93mcore[0m [93mconditions[0m, [93miron[0m [93mtends[0m to [93mreverse[0m its [93mredox[0m [93mnature[0m, [93mchanging[0m from an [93melectron[0m [93mdonor[0m ([93mreductant[0m) to an [93melectron[0m [93macceptor[0m ([93moxidant[0m), and [93moxidizes[0m [93mmany[0m [93mp[0m -[93mblock[0m [93melements[0m. [93mSuch[0m [93mreverse[0m [93mredox[0m [93mpropensity[0m [93msignificantly[0m [93mimpacts[0m the [93mstoichiometries[0m, [93mbond[0m [93mtypes[0m and [93mstrengths[0m, [93mstructures[0m, and [93mproperties[0m of [93miron[0m [93mcompounds[0m under [93mdeep[0m [93mplanetary[0m [93mconditions[0m. This [91mchange[0m [93mtransforms[0m [93mmany[0m [93mp[0m- [93mblock[0m [93melements[0m ([93mconventionally[0m [93mlabeled[0m [93mlithophile[0m or [93mchalcophile[0m) into [93mhighly[0m [93msiderophile[0m [93mspecies[0m. The [93mchemical[0m [93mbinding[0m [93mstrengths[0m with [93miron[0m [93mshow[0m an [93minverse[0m [93mcorrelation[0m with the [93mdepletion[0m of [93mp[0m -[93mblock[0m [93melements[0m in the [93msilicate[0m [93mEarth[0m. [93mFurthermore[0m, [93msilicon[0m [93mshows[0m a [93mdistinct[0m [93manomaly[0m in its [93mbonding[0m to [93miron[0m, which [93msuggests[0m [93msilicon[0m [93mmay[0m [93mreadily[0m be [93mincorporated[0m into [93mEarth[0m'[93ms[0m [93mcore[0m.
